document_data.name: Graycloak's Wolves
document_data.mainbody: '''Graycloak's Wolves''' was an [[adventuring company]] active in [[1343 DR]], and led by [[Irmar Graycloak]].
document_data.Activities: Graycloak's Wolves were active in the city of [[Hlondeth]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]] in the [[1343 DR|Year of the Boot, 1343 DR]], when they were requested to deliver the ''[[Tome of Torment]]''—the most holy book of the [[church of Ilmater]]—to Master Sufferer [[Olbedan]] in [[Aralent]]. However, during the harsh winter, Graycloak's Wolves fell prey to [[doppelganger]]s and [[leucrotta]] preying on travellers. The ''Tome'' was thought lost in the winter snows.
